value.title: Drupal Blocks | Drush Site-Install
value.description: <div class="az-element az-section" style="" data-az-id="gbi2lpzmse" data-azat-pid="gbi2lpzmse" id="gbi2lpzmse" data-azb="az_section"><div class="az-ctnr container" data-azcnt="true"><div class="az-element az-text hover-style-gbo841e85m" style="font-size:NaN;border-radius:NaN;overflow: hidden;opacity:NaN;" data-az-id="gbo841e85m" data-azat-pid="gbo841e85m" id="gbo841e85m" data-azb="az_text" data-azat-style="font-size:NaN;border-radius

body.value:
The below block should display the Search form, but only to users that have permission to use Search. On this demo site that does not include the Anonymous user role.

The below Drupal block is provided by the Webform module. 

  • Test that the form is displayed correctly
  • Test that the form validation works correctly
  • Test that the form submits correctly

The below Drupal block is provided by the Moderation Dashboard module. 

  • Test that the block is displayed correctly
